Endpoint_Description: Retrieve policy details by policy ID - Returns complete policy information including coverage details
Create a new insurance policy - Validates policy data and creates new policy record
Search policies by various criteria - Supports filtering by customer ID agent territory and policy status
Submit a new insurance claim - Customer-facing endpoint for claim submission
Get current claim status and details - Returns claim status processing updates and estimated resolution
Update claim processing status - Internal endpoint for claim processors to update status
Retrieve customer profile information - Complete customer profile including contact information and preferences
Update customer profile information - Customer self-service endpoint for profile updates
Get agent dashboard with key metrics - Dashboard showing sales metrics commission info and pending tasks
Process insurance premium payment - Secure payment processing with multiple payment methods
System health check endpoint - Simple health check returning system status
Detailed application status and diagnostics - Comprehensive system diagnostics including database connectivity and external service status
